name: Chamomilla
Relationship: Compare: Cypriped; Anthemis; Aconite; Puls.; Coffea; Bellad.; Staphis.; gnat. Follows Belladonna in diseases of children and abuse of opium. Rubus villosus - Blackberry - (diarrhoea of infancy; stools watery and clay colored).Antidotes: Camph.; Nux; Puls.Complementary: Bell.; Mag. c.

Stool: Hot, GREEN, watery, fetid, SLIMY, with colic
Chopped white and yellow mucus like chopped eggs and spinach
Head: Throbbing headache in one-half of the brain
Inclined to bend head backward
Hot, clammy sweat on forehead and scalp
Stomach: Pressive gastralgia, as from a stone
Abdomen: Flatulent colic, after anger, WITH RED CHEEKS AND HOT PERSPIRATION
Griping in region of navel, and pain in small of back
Mouth: Toothache, if anything warm is taken, from coffee, during pregnancy
Respiratory: IRRITABLE, DRY TICKLING COUGH; suffocative tightness of chest, with bitter expectoration in daytime
Rattling of mucus in child's chest
Face: Stitches in jaw extending to inner ear and teeth
Jerking of tongue and facial muscles
TEETH ACHE WORSE AFTER WARM DRINK; worse, coffee, at night
ONE CHEEK RED and hot; the other pale and cold
Ears: EARACHE, with soreness; SWELLING AND HEAT DRIVING PATIENT FRANTIC
Mind: Child can only be quieted when carried about and petted constantly
Child wants many things which he refuses again
IMPATIENT, intolerant of being spoken to or interrupted; extremely sensitive to every pain; always complaining
Piteous moaning because he cannot have what he wants
Back: Insupportable pain in loins and hips
Sleep: Drowsiness with moaning, weeping and wailing during sleep; anxious, frightened dreams, with half-open eyes
Female: Profuse discharge of clotted, DARK BLOOD, WITH LABOR-LIKE PAINS
Throat: Constriction and pain as from a plug
Extremities: ANKLES GIVE WAY IN THE AFTERNOON Nightly paralytic loss of power in the feet, unable to step on them
Violent rheumatic pains drive him out of bed at night; compelled to walk about

details: Chamomilla is SENSITIVE, IRRITABLE, THIRSTY, HOT, AND NUMB. Over-sensitiveness from abuse of coffee and narcotics. PAINS UNENDURABLE, associated with numbness. Night-sweats.The chief guiding symptoms belong to the mental and emotional group, which lead to this remedy in many forms of disease. Especially of frequent employment in diseases of children, where peevishness, restlessness, and colic give the needful indications. A disposition that is mild, calm and gentle; sluggish and constipated bowels contraindicate Chamomilla.
